Ability.Name: Mark of the Wild
Ability.Lua:
local MoW = UnitBuff("player", "Mark of the Wild") local prowl = UnitBuff("player", "Prowl")
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") or prowl ~= nil then return false else if MoW == nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: ShapeShift
Ability.Lua:
local myHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local stance = GetShapeshiftForm("player")
if stance == 5 or IsMounted() then return true end
if myHP >= 30 and stance ~= 3 then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(3) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") else if myHP <=29 and stance ~= 1 then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(1) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end end

Ability.Name: Prowl
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Free Ravage
Ability.Lua:
local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede")
if stamp ~= nil then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") RunMacroText("/cast Ravage!") RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end

Ability.Name: SS Slows
Ability.Lua:
buff = { 45524, 5116, 61394, 2974, 54644, 26679, 8056, 18223, 63311, 1715, 12323 } local havebuff = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID("player",v) then havebuff = 1 end end
if havebuff then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastShapeshiftForm(3) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end

Ability.Name: Freedom
Ability.Lua:
buff = { 122, 339, 54706, 4167, 33395, 83302, 55080, 64695, 63685, 39965, 55536, 13099 } local havebuff = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID("player",v) then havebuff = 1 end end
if havebuff then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") CastSpellByID(1850) CastSpellByID(77764) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end

Ability.Name: -- DEFENSIVE SPELLS --
Ability.Lua: if IsMouseButtonDown() and GetMouseFocus() ~= nil and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() then if GetMouseFocus():GetName() ~= nil then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") return true end end

Ability.Name: -- OFENSIVE SPELLS --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if UnitIsDead("target") or immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or IsSpellInRange("Pounce", "target") == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Barkskin
Ability.Lua:
local myHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if myHP <= 85 then return true end

Ability.Name: Survival Instincts
Ability.Lua:
local myHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if myHP <= 75 then return true end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua:
local myEgy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if myEgy < 60 then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: TRINKET 1
Ability.Lua: if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end

Ability.Name: Cyclone
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, PS = UnitBuffID("player", 69369) local inRange = IsSpellInRange("Cyclone", "focus")
if PS ~= nil and inRange == 1 then return true else return false end

Ability.Name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
Ability.Lua:
local FF, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitDebuffID("target", 91565) local FFstart, FFduration, FFenabled = GetSpellCooldown(16857) local FFcooldown = (FFstart + FFduration - GetTime())
if FF == nil then if FFcooldown > 0 then return false else return true end end

Ability.Name: Ferocious Bite
Ability.Lua:
local fbrip, _, _, _, _, _, fbtimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local fbCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local fbhealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local fbenergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if fbCP == 5 and fbenergy >= 60 then return true end

Ability.Name: Maim
Ability.Lua:
local mCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local MMstart, MMduration = GetSpellCooldown(22570) local MMcooldown = (MMstart + MMduration - GetTime())
if MMcooldown > 0 then return false else if mCP == 5 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Mangle
Ability.Lua:
-- Rogues and Warriors can handle it themselves. local hasCatMangle, _, _, _, _, _, CatMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle, _, _, _, _, _, BearMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878, "PLAYER") local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511) local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if PQR_NotBehindTarget() then if CP == 5 then return false else return true end end
-- First, let's let other people handle their own debuffs if hasTrauma ~= nil then return false elseif hasHemorrhage ~= nil then return false elseif hasBearMangle ~= nil then return false
-- Let us handle it! elseif hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil then -- Check the timer if CatMangleTimer - GetTime() < 1 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: Rake
Ability.Lua:
local rake, _, _, _, _, _, raketimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1822, "player")
if rake ~= nil then if raketimer - GetTime() < 3 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: Rip
Ability.Lua:
local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local ripCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local riphealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if rip ~= nil then if riphealth > 25 then if ripCP == 5 then if riptimer - GetTime() < 2 then return true end end end else if ripCP == 5 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Savage Roar
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,SavageRoar = UnitBuffID("player", 62071) local srCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER")
if SavageRoar ~= nil then return false else if rip ~= nil then if srCP >= 1 then if riptimer - GetTime() >= 1 then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: Shred
Ability.Lua:
-- Check for the debuffs. local hasCatMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878) local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511) local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
-- Just check for all buffs, we have no casting time on Shred so no need for a timer check if hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil or hasTrauma ~= nil or hasHemorrhage ~= nil then if PQR_NotBehindTarget() then return false else if CP == 5 then return false else return true end end end

Ability.Name: Tigers Fury
Ability.Lua:
local tfEgy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if tfEgy <= 40 then return true end

Ability.Name: Pounce
Ability.Lua: return true
